title: TEMM Score Weight Configuration (Normalized)
description: Defines the configuration for prioritizing core operational scores (Goal Alignment, Resource Efficiency, System Resilience). All weights must be normalized [0.0, 1.0]. The runtime system enforces that these three weights sum precisely to 1.0.

normalized_weight.description: A normalized weight multiplier between 0.0 and 1.0.

GHS_weight.description: W1: Weight multiplier for the Goal Alignment Score (GHS_score).

RES_weight.description: W2: Weight multiplier for the Resource Efficiency Score (RES_score).

SRS_weight.description: W3: Weight multiplier for the System Resilience Score (SRS_score).
